00022 /*
00023  * lustre/utils/liblustreapi_lease.c
00024  *
00025  * lustreapi library for file leases
00026  *
00027  * Author: Henri Doreau <henri.doreau@cea.fr>
00028  */
00029 
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <fcntl.h>
00032 #include <sys/ioctl.h>
00033 #include <errno.h>
00034 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00035 #include "lustreapi_internal.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 static inline const char *lease_mode2str(int mode)
00039 {
00040         switch (mode) {
00041         case LL_LEASE_WRLCK: return "WRITE";
00042         case LL_LEASE_RDLCK: return "READ";
00043         case LL_LEASE_UNLCK: return "UNLOCK";
00044         }
00045         return "???";
00046 }
00047 
00057 int llapi_lease_get(int fd, int mode)
00058 {
00059         int rc;
00060 
00061         if (mode != LL_LEASE_RDLCK && mode != LL_LEASE_WRLCK)
00062                 return -EINVAL;
00063 
00064         rc = ioctl(fd, LL_IOC_SET_LEASE, mode);
00065         if (rc < 0) {
00066                 rc = -errno;
00067                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, rc, "cannot get %s lease",
00068                             lease_mode2str(mode));
00069         }
00070         return rc;
00071 }
00072 
00082 int llapi_lease_check(int fd)
00083 {
00084         int rc;
00085 
00086         rc = ioctl(fd, LL_IOC_GET_LEASE);
00087         if (rc < 0) {
00088                 rc = -errno;
00089                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, rc, "cannot check lease");
00090         }
00091         return rc;
00092 }
00093 
00103 int llapi_lease_put(int fd)
00104 {
00105         int rc;
00106 
00107         rc = ioctl(fd, LL_IOC_SET_LEASE, LL_LEASE_UNLCK);
00108         if (rc < 0) {
00109                 rc = -errno;
00110                 llapi_error(LLAPI_MSG_ERROR, rc, "cannot put lease");
00111         }
00112         return rc;
00113 }
